title: League of legends log in launch pop ups unclickable
body: I recently tried logging into my league of legends account but discovered upon opening the launcher, there were no clickable buttons on the menu.  There is a pop up that appears but is only halfway revealed, so even if there are buttons beneath the pop up, I cant click them or even view them, in other words the pop up is cut off.  I have tried uninstalling and re-installing to no avail.  Does anyone know what the problem is or is this a virus on my computer?

replies.body:
Hey Death!

It sounds like you're experiencing the same issue as a few players where they can't accept the terms and conditions due to their DPI settings. [Here ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/LpIqNmo4-after-downtime-and-patch-patcher-window-is-wrong-size?comment=0002)is a workaround the Elduris made to get around this issue!
